title: Donate
subtitle: Raise funds for your favorite cause with this app on your Facebook Page.
bells_whistles: Facebook fundraising made easy. Upload a large image communicating an overview of your cause with a strong call to action. Application flexibility lets you change the landing image, link, and message in seconds.

features.title: Traffic Control
features.description: Control where your fans go next by linking them to other Facebook tabs or any URL on the web.

features.title: Easy Design
features.description: Our Content Management System makes creating, editing, and updating your Facebook app simple. Easy editing tools let you change directions quickly - not holding you to your "web guy's" schedule.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.
